name: tpgfe
description: Touch Portal Plugin for NVIDIA GeForce Experience

scripts.build-win: npm run pkg-win && move tpgfe.exe base/Win/TPGeForceExperience/ && del Installers\TPGeForceExperience-Win.tpp && cd base\Win && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPGeForceExperience-Win.tpp TPGeForceExperience

author: croutonn
